framework_summary: A brief summary of the framework's purpose, architecture, and key features.

dimensions.name: Developer Experience
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's developer experience.

questions.question: Does it provide a high level Agent abstraction with the ability to attach any LLM/model, tools, memory components?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

questions.question: Does it provide a low level API for custom agents and complex orchestration behavior?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

dimensions.name: Asynchronous API
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's asynchronous capabilities.

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

dimensions.name: Event-Driven Communication
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's event-driven communication capabilities.

questions.question: Is the framework event-driven at its core?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

questions.question: Does it provide a runtime abstraction that supports both local and distributed deployments?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

dimensions.name: State Management
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's state management capabilities.

questions.question: Can you checkpoint and resume an agent or entire workflow (consisting of multiple agents)?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

dimensions.name: Declarative Specifications
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's support for declarative specifications.

questions.question: Can agents be serialized to a declarative format like JSON and runtime objects reconstructed from them?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

dimensions.name: Debugging and Evaluation Tools
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's debugging and evaluation tools.

questions.question: Does the framework provide a UI interface to rapidly modify prototype teams, reuse existing components, inspect agent runtime behaviors?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

questions.question: Does the framework provide evaluation tools (interactive or offline/batch) to compare multiple multi-agent configurations?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

dimensions.name: Multi-Agent Pattern Support
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's support for multi-agent patterns.

questions.question: Does the framework provide both autonomous multi-agent patterns and deterministic workflow patterns?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

questions.question: Do these patterns include built-in task management capabilities (determining when a task is complete, human delegation mechanisms)?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

dimensions.name: Observability
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's observability capabilities.

questions.question: Does the framework provide visibility into agent interactions, message flows, and resource metrics?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

questions.question: Does it integrate with standard observability tools for production monitoring and debugging?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

dimensions.name: Deployment Capabilities
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's deployment capabilities.

questions.question: Does it provide guidance and tooling for scalable, resilient production deployments?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question

dimensions.name: Ecosystem and Community
dimensions.dimension_justification: Overall assessment of the framework's ecosystem and community.

questions.question: Is there an active community with strong documentation and growing ecosystem?

evidence.relevance: How this evidence relates to the question
